title: Inflation in Services Likely to Rise Further Despite Slowing Goods Prices
description: Given rising demand for in-person services, the slow pass-through of surging house prices to rent and ownersâ€™ equivalent rent (OER), and higher health care worker wages, services inflation is likely to increase further.
dc:creator: Atkinson, Tyler; Zhou, Xiaoqing
dc:subject: Inflation; Real Estate; Monetary Policy
